Catalyst has four custom **Oilrigs** map edits.
- **Two Oilrigs** are only accessible by `helicopters`, the other two are accessible by `swimming and helicopter.`
- Oilrigs that are accessible by helicopter have `higher tier loot` than the others, although the swimable oilrigs still have high tier loot `compared to the sourrounding land area.`
- All Oilrigs have hidden Military Crate Stashes that will need a key to open. They also have Safes that will need a keycard to open.*__(Please refer to the Hidden Stashes Guide).__*
- Oilrig locations are found in the photo guide below.
